column2: Preformed Line Products Co. designs, manufactures, and supplies cable anchoring and control hardware and systems, fiber optic and copper splice closures, and cross-connect devices. The company is headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio and currently employs 2,650 full-time employees. The firm's products include Formed Wire and Related Hardware Products, Protective Closures, Plastic Products and Other Products. The firm operates through four segments: PLP-USA (including corporate), The Americas (includes operations in North and South America without PLP-USA), EMEA (Europe, Middle East and Africa) and Asia-Pacific. The firm's PLP-USA segment consists of its United States operations manufacturing its traditional products primarily supporting its domestic energy, telecommunications and solar products. Its other three segments, The Americas, EMEA and Asia-Pacific, support its energy, telecommunications, data communication and solar products in each respective geographical region.
